tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
quoteText: If you choose to share any other information with a third party, such as Facebook, Twitter, or an email provider, the collection and sharing of that information will be governed by that third party’s privacy policy. We can’t control what Facebook, Twitter, or anyone else does with information you choose to share with them
